plugin-data.name: Atom Feed
plugin-data.description:
Creates an Atom web syndication feed of your site.
URL: http://example.com/feed.atom

atom-feed-copyright-tip:
More information about copyright licenses.
Default is "CC By-SA 4.0". Leave blank to disable.
atom-feed-generator-tip:
A string indicating the program used to generate the Atom feed.
Default is "Bludit - Flat-File CMS". Leave blank to disable.
atom-feed-item-limit-tip: Maximum number of items in Atom feed. Default is "10".
atom-feed-url-tip: URL that people use to subscribe to your Atom feed.
